languages.text: С бунтарями покончено, но больше подобных выходок на борту я ни от кого не потерплю. Пусть Идиру Тласс выбросят в шлюз.

traits.locale_text: С бунтарями покончено, но больше подобных выходок на борту я ни от кого не потерплю. Пусть Идиру Тласс выбросят в шлюз.

languages.text: "The rebels have been dealt with, but I will not tolerate another stunt like that from anyone on board. Have Idira Tlass tossed out of an airlock."
languages.original_text: С бунтарями покончено, но больше подобных выходок на борту я ни от кого не потерплю. Пусть Идиру Тласс выбросят в шлюз.

traits.locale_text: "The rebels have been dealt with, but I will not tolerate another stunt like that from anyone on board. Have Idira Tlass tossed out of an airlock."
"The rebels have been dealt with, but I will not tolerate another stunt like that from anyone on board. Have Idira Tlass tossed out of an airlock."
"The rebels have been dealt with, but I will not tolerate another stunt like that from anyone on board. Have Idira Tlass tossed out of an airlock."
"The rebels have been dealt with, but I will not tolerate another stunt like that from anyone on board. Have Idira Tlass tossed out of an airlock."

languages.text: “叛乱分子已经消灭掉了，但我不会容忍任何人再在我的船上干出这种事情。叫人过来，把伊迪拉·特拉斯从气闸里扔出去。”
languages.original_text: "The rebels have been dealt with, but I will not tolerate another stunt like that from anyone on board. Have Idira Tlass tossed out of an airlock."

traits.locale_text: “叛乱分子已经消灭掉了，但我不会容忍任何人再在我的船上干出这种事情。叫人过来，把伊迪拉·特拉斯从气闸里扔出去。”

languages.text: «Me he encargado de los rebeldes, pero no pienso tolerar otra actuación como esa de ningún miembro de la tripulación. Lance a Idira Tlass por una esclusa».
languages.original_text: "The rebels have been dealt with, but I will not tolerate another stunt like that from anyone on board. Have Idira Tlass tossed out of an airlock."

traits.locale_text: «Me he encargado de los rebeldes, pero no pienso tolerar otra actuación como esa de ningún miembro de la tripulación. Lance a Idira Tlass por una esclusa».

languages.text: 「反乱者は始末したが、船内の誰であれ、あのような馬鹿げた行為はこれ以上許されん。イディラ・トラスをエアロックから放り出せ」
languages.original_text: "The rebels have been dealt with, but I will not tolerate another stunt like that from anyone on board. Have Idira Tlass tossed out of an airlock."

traits.locale_text: 「反乱者は始末したが、船内の誰であれ、あのような馬鹿げた行為はこれ以上許されん。イディラ・トラスをエアロックから放り出せ」

languages.text: "Die Rebellen sind Geschichte, aber ich werde eine derartige Aktion nicht noch einmal dulden. Von niemandem an Bord. Lasst Idira Tlass aus einer Luftschleuse werfen."
languages.original_text: "The rebels have been dealt with, but I will not tolerate another stunt like that from anyone on board. Have Idira Tlass tossed out of an airlock."

traits.locale_text: "Die Rebellen sind Geschichte, aber ich werde eine derartige Aktion nicht noch einmal dulden. Von niemandem an Bord. Lasst Idira Tlass aus einer Luftschleuse werfen."

languages.text: « Les rebelles sont hors d'état de nuire, mais je ne tolérerai plus le moindre écart de la part de qui que ce soit à bord. Qu'on éjecte Idira Tlass par le premier sas venu. »
languages.original_text: "The rebels have been dealt with, but I will not tolerate another stunt like that from anyone on board. Have Idira Tlass tossed out of an airlock."

traits.locale_text: « Les rebelles sont hors d'état de nuire, mais je ne tolérerai plus le moindre écart de la part de qui que ce soit à bord. Qu'on éjecte Idira Tlass par le premier sas venu. »

languages.text: "İsyancıların icabına baktım ama gemide kimseden böyle bir şaklabanlık daha görmek istemiyorum. İdira Tlass'ı da hava kilidinden fırlatın gitsin."
languages.original_text: "The rebels have been dealt with, but I will not tolerate another stunt like that from anyone on board. Have Idira Tlass tossed out of an airlock."

traits.locale_text: "İsyancıların icabına baktım ama gemide başka kimseden böyle bir şaklabanlık istemiyorum. İdira Tlass'ı da hava kilidinden fırlatın gitsin."
